metadata.name: a c care Bees Sun Protection Lotion

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated as an active sunscreen agent

contraindications.disease: Oral LD50 in rat is 9600 mg kg MSDS
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: In a mouse study amiloxate exerted a dose dependent anti inflammatory action and inhibited edema by about 70 even at a low dose A32916 Due to structural similarities amiloxate may also display antioxidant and antimicrobial properties of cinnamic acid A32917
